website_summaries.verdict: Tops our list for its ability to combat clutter and keep toothbrushes germ-free at the same time. A hands-down winner.
pros: Sleek stainless steel construction does a great job of concealing multiple toothbrushes and a tube of toothpaste
Covered to protect from dust and germs
cons: Needs frequent wiping down to prevent water spots

customer_reviews.title: Easily accumulates gross gunk build up! Home for maggots!
customer_reviews.text: This item doesn't dry itself even in a dry bathroom even though it supposedly has ventilation. Gross gunk build up easily accumulates. One time, I forgot to clean it for about two months and found a huge amount of build up at the bottom where an army of maggots had taken over. The grossest thing I have seen in my life!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eliot Pooh

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: I liked this so my toothbrushes would be covered and it looks sleek on the counter. However, the little rubber things inside are so difficult to clean. After awhile black mold gets on them. Even soaking it in hot water and bleach didn't get it off and I may buy the new version because that looks easidr to keep clean
customer_reviews.author: NNY

customer_reviews.title: Nice but huge
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. It is way larger than anticipated and will not fit on the side of my sink. It’s a nice concept and I’ll keep it and use it in a different bathroom for the kids instead because of the size. You definitely need a good amount of counter space if you don’t want tonhave to pick it up to open it each time. It is also very shiny stainless, not brushed/dull like anticipated. Overall a decent product though.
customer_reviews.author: JNapier

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: No problems with it. It holds WAY more toothbrushes than I need it to as a single man, but that doesn't bother me as I always keep 2 replacement toothbrushed around for when it's time to throw the current one away. Now I can store them in here rather than taking up drawer space. It IS large, but again, that's not an issue for me. The finish does tend to spot up alot if you touch it with wet hands. Therefore I knocked off a star.But I may spray the stainless Exterior with Shellac or Laquer to help combat that issue. All in all I like it and I'd buy it again or recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Jim P.

customer_reviews.title: NO RUST after 6 months of use
customer_reviews.text: I waited for 6 months to leave this review, cause I wanted to see if this thing ever rusts. NO RUST so far. there was some red spots and I thought they were rust, but they were easily cleaned, I don't know what they were, but they were not rust, and they were easily removed. you can keep your toothbrushes out of poop dust! lol
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: In theory this would have been great . . .
customer_reviews.text: I liked this item because of the height. Most electric toothbrushes are slightly taller than the other holders and the description says that you can remove the insert if your toothbrush is wider than the slot. In theory this item would have been great but when you remove the insert to put in electric toothbrushes, there is no bottom to the holder and the brushes and toothpaste just fall out the bottom if you pick it up to move it. Seems like an important fact that they should have stated in the description!
customer_reviews.author: FI

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Open at the bottom and at the top . Hudge gap instead of perforation . Waste of money . It doesnt do the very basic reason you want it for . For instance if there are any pest where ever you carry this arround they can easily slide in to enjoy the toothpaste .
customer_reviews.author: brook

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: It rusted almost immediately. The design of the actual toothbrush sections end up pushing the toothbrush outward, making it touch the inside of the lid unless very carefully placing the toothbrush in. There is a lot of wasted space inside the holder that's taken up by plastic dividers. Honestly, who needs four divided spaces for multiple toothbrushes each? It also has a hard time fitting large tooth paste tubes inside.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Space Saver!
customer_reviews.text: Easily fits toothbrushes in all four slots as well as toothpaste (both full and less full) and is very good quality. I am not sure how well the toothpaste will fit once it is getting to the end of the tube, but for now it is great. The only issue I have with it is that you will have to make sure all of the brushes aren't sticking out when closing it. Having to hold them in while also trying to close it is a little annoying but nothing that would deter me from enjoying this product.
customer_reviews.author: MGrey777

customer_reviews.title: Terrific for Toothbrushes!
customer_reviews.text: Still using this after all this time! It holds regular size toothbrushes and tubes of thoothpaste. Does show smudge marks because it’s stainless steel! I just wash mine with dish soap and let it air dry. Love it! Keeps the brushes clean and has air vents to let it dry!
customer_reviews.author: Puddles

customer_reviews.title: compartments too small for battery toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: I was really hopeful this container would replace our current one. Unfortunately you cannot fit a battery operated toothbrush in the designated slots. If you store it in the center with the toothpaste, then you can only store ONE toothbrush. We need to store three and this container would not accommodate our needs. We tried removing the white, compartmental insert, but then it leaves you with no bottom. :-( OXO is a respectable brand. If the compartment section was removable this would totally work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: NICE IDEA - HOLDS TOOTHBRUSH AND TOOTH PASTE
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of this product. It does the job of holding the toothbrush and toothpaste as I don't have a medicine cabinet and was not looking to start drilling holes into my new walls (just purchased a new home). The only downside to this....is that it's hard to "shine" and keep clean. Fingerprints seem to NEVER get wiped away and it does look stained. If I had the choice to order again.....knowing what I know now.....I would get "white" if available.
customer_reviews.author: cevan1967

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: We have a small bathroom and I worry about germs on our toothbrushes, especially considering the times. This is absolutely perfect. It seals tight enough to keep out the nasties but not so tight that it's difficult to open. One of my favorite purchases and a brilliant design. I keep four toothbrushes in there ... I have no worries about them touching each other, let alone the air, unless of course I'm using it. I haven't had to clean it yet, but I can see how you're supposed to clean it and it seems to be very easy. If anything bad happens when I clean it, I'll let you know, but I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Multiple flaws
customer_reviews.text: Multiple flaws: The way the lid opens will prevent you from having it against a wall. If you put multiple tooth brushes inside they do end up touching. If you want your toothbrush to dry between uses, you have to flick a lot of the water off before putting it inside. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ovi Blue

customer_reviews.title: Impossible
customer_reviews.text: MY husband and I live alone and are very clean people so this holder drives us crazy, there is no way to keep it looking good. If you had a 4 foot vanity and could keep it in the back corner it might be OK . But on a 36 inch one it is constantly being splashed with water drops which look terrible, wish I had purchased a white one.
customer_reviews.author: Larry F.

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I was on the hunt for a toothbrush organizer to complement my bathroom decor, as well as something to provide some protection from germs that are common within vicinity of a toilet. Must not have read the description well enough because the container is not sealed but comes with vents. Beyond this, it is a neat item that will hold multiple brushes as well as a toothpaste tube. Easy to clean for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M Mcguire

customer_reviews.title: Compromise and value.
customer_reviews.text: Works great since I hate having toothbrushes in drawers and my fiance doesn't like them on the counter.... Alot of cheap fixes like the plastic container get grody after a week or so and doesn't keep everything together for convenience. This holds everything toothpaste, and brushes without being exposed to germs flushed into the air. Really easy to use and I like that it holds more than 2 toothbrushes and they don't touch. The perfect compromise.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned up my toothpaste mess
customer_reviews.text: I seem to have a difficult time with toothpaste escaping from the tube... if it's in the drawer, it goes everywhere. On top of the vanity, again - blue everywhere. I bought this hoping it would solve my problems. It looks great and made my mess disappear. It is very easy to clean. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Modern
customer_reviews.text: This toothbrush holder is great, its big, can hold plenty of toothbrushes, like 10 and it can hold a tube of toothpaste. Opening and closing is smooth, it can be dirtied by splashed water but easy to clean. Fingerprint free. I'd recommend for family use for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased and happy I purchased!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this item because of its silver and detailed appearance and my two daughters do not have a drawer of medicine cabinet to put their toothpaste and toothbrush. I couldn’t be happier! It fits perfectly on the shelves and no one even knows what’s in it until you open it! I thought it was a little pricey for $40 bucks for 2 of them but it was definitely worth it!! No more toothpaste and toothbrushes on the sink exposed to germs 🦠!
customer_reviews.author: Nakeeta Malone

customer_reviews.title: Both the initial purchase and replacement came broken
customer_reviews.text: I never give bad reviews, but I ordered the first one and it came with a part missing. So I returned for a replacement, and it came with all the parts but the top disk was broken off. I had to glue it back on. The other issue I have with this is that it does not have room for both my toothpaste and electric toothbrush while the insert is in, so I have had to take the insert out, put a cup in so that I can use this. I will be on the search for a better option.
customer_reviews.author: G. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great toothbrush holder!
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty awesome toothbrush holder. Prior to this, we used the pods or the other cheap toothbrush holders. The problem with those is the toothbrushes never seemed to dry! Also, they'd get gross and we'd have to toss them pretty quickly, as sometimes the little grooves just couldn't be cleaned. This container, however, holds all 5 of our toothbrushes (we use the middle as well, instead of holding toothpaste there) and they are all dry by bedtime, when it's time to brush again. I know our toothbrushes are protected, and it's very easy to clean, inside and out. For the price, it's a bargain, because I know it's going to last awhile.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Pouncey

customer_reviews.title: Not good for most electric toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: This item seemed like it would work. Just wish they were taller to accommodate electric toothbrushes like a Sonicare or Oral-B. Had to return it bc my toothbrushes were just too tall. The top cover was a little flimsy when opening it as well. But, nothing wrong with the product other than not tall enough and the slots are not designed for wider toothbrushes.
customer_reviews.author: RKA

customer_reviews.title: Rusts quickly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it had a lid. What I don’t like about it is 1) it’s huge 2) stains very easily from water drops 3) it’s rusted after about 2 months of use. Wish I could return it. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Urbats

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice on the outside
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice toothbrush & paste holder as it had a lid that closed. Unfortunately it is very big and it looked out of place. Also, the bottom is partially opened when I thought it was completely closed in. Recommend for a family that has lots of toothbrushes and space for it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for germ freaks
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. I am only disappointed that I didn’t discover it sooner. Although it does show fingerprints, wiping them off is a small price to pay. The item looks nice and does its job well. It is great that it fits toothpaste too.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Hintz

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Holds 4 tooth brushes and a tube of paste in the middle. Underneath the holder is open so any excess water or moisture can escape which is great. Keeps your brushes closed off from the rest of the bathroom Germs. It is big though but I don’t care. It fits nicely on one corner of my sink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product - shows a lot of fingerprint smears
customer_reviews.text: Love the holder - however it shows fingerprints quite a bit. It’s aggravating to clean or wipe your finger marks everyday. Overall it’s a good product. I love the ability to ‘hide’ my toothbrush and toothpaste and still have sitting on the counter in a decorative holder.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Keeps toothbrushes out of sight
customer_reviews.text: Love the design - but warning...does not hold fat-handled toothbrushes as in the battery operated ones. Made for old fashioned narrow handles . Still it's far better than the usual out-in-the-open holders. Just remember to pull out interior holder to clean once a week or you might get mold growing.
customer_reviews.author: ACS

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and healthy option to covering the toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: Sorry folks, but many studies show that items in your bathroom, including your toothbrush, contain fecal bacteria. That said, it's not going to kill you but still, this is an attractive way of covering the toothbrush. BTW, its also on your cell phone-wish I hadn't seen this.
customer_reviews.author: jhawk1966

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have pets
customer_reviews.text: Our cat likes to hop up on the sink, and wander around. This keeps our toothbrushes safe, even when we're not around to shoo her away. Easily holds two brushes, looks like it could hold 4 without too much trouble.
customer_reviews.author: TimTheEnchanter

customer_reviews.title: Quality toothbrush holder!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product to hide toothbrushes in the bathroom. Holds 1 toothpaste and a few toothbrushes. Unfortunately, does not hold my son's electronic toothbrush. Even with that said, I would definitely recommend this. Like all stainless products, it shows fingerprints (fine with me). Quality product for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Vjhawkins602417

customer_reviews.title: Good Protection
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this sturdy container so far. I protects my toothbrush from insects, yet has ways it can air out. I also like that it keeps the space looking tidy and neat.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie

customer_reviews.title: Very large,but nice!
customer_reviews.text: Much larger than I had expected. It takes up a lot of space on the sink counter but I love it. It fits 4 regular sized toothbrushes as well as a large tube of toothpaste. So no wonder it’s so large! I love that it keeps it all concealed and safe from just the daily dust in the air. Makes me feel good in that regard. I’d buy again and therefore I still give it 5 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my toothbrush clean!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I am kind of in love with this toothbrush holder. I got it because I read this article about how germs go airborne in the bathroom. Our toilet happens to be in close proximity to our sink area and it grosses me out how close my toothbrush is to the area. The fact that this thing has a lid gives me better peace of my mind that my toothrbush is staying nice and clean. It looks nice too. You will have to place sideways though so you can easily open the lid. And yes, the lid is heavier than the base (which I read in reviews), but for me it hasn't been an issue.
customer_reviews.author: munkeyhoots

customer_reviews.title: I found a nice set in the brushed nickel I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a one piece toothbrush and toothpaste holder. They really don't make very many of these. I found a nice set in the brushed nickel I needed, but the toothbrush holder/toothpaste holder was terrible. The toothbrushes flopped all around... I returned it and continued the search. I found this. It matches and now I no longer need covers on the toothbrushes either,since this closes.
customer_reviews.author: mittmott

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: For some reason this item is larger than I envisioned but I love everything about it. It easily holds four toothbrushes and a tube of toothpaste. It is well ventilated so it doesn't get moldy and has removable sleeves that can be washed.
customer_reviews.author: Bluegrass Gazer

customer_reviews.title: A little high-maintenance for a toothbrush holder.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could love this. The toothbrushes have to be placed just right or you need to re-arrange/push them toward the center so the lid will shut. Which means it remains open half the time. And stainless steel? What was I thinking? It's always covered in toothpastey fingerprints. I have to wipe it down at least twice a day. When it's clean, it looks really nice and the airflow design seems good for toothbrush storage. It's just a little high-maintenance for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jaline

customer_reviews.title: Inevitable toothbrush head tête-à-tête contact
customer_reviews.text: It’s super easy to clean and looks pretty sleek when your fingerprints aren’t smudged all over it. However this toothbrush holder gets 3 stars because the rubber comb parts within the sections are really flimsy with no way to replace them. Toothbrush heads touching each other is kind of gross to think about yet unavoidable with this product because of those combs. Tip: Be sure to clean this thing regularly... because the gunk that accumulates at the bottom is absolutely disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: The insert is removable for easy cleaning -- and it definitely needs to be cleaned ...
customer_reviews.text: We're short of storage and shelf space in our bathroom and this helps keep things organized. The insert is removable for easy cleaning -- and it definitely needs to be cleaned once in awhile to avoid grossness. The outside does get water spots, but this isn't a deal breaker for us -- and they can be wiped away. This isn't a petite toothbrush holder, so pay attention to the dimensions given in the product details! Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Again!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice toothbrush holder. I love the size and the looks. It does show water spots as others have said, but they clean off very easy...no problem here. The pull out inside is very easy to clean, the air vents let the brushes dry and it opens and closes very nice. I give it 5 stars and would highly recommend. Also great price!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Harbold

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic. I love the sleek design it holds the toothbrushes and toothpaste as designed and it closes nicely. It’s not too big and not too bulky. This has been a great addition to our bathroom decor. Keeps things out.
customer_reviews.author: amanda George

customer_reviews.title: REALLY BULKY
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A NICE TOOTHBRUSH HOLDER. THE 2 MAIN PROBLEMS ARE THAT IT IS VERY BULKY AND YOU NEED AN OPEN AREA TO OPEN THE TOP. ALSO FINGERPRINTS LEAVE MARKS ON THE OUTSIDE LIKE THE OLD STAINLESS STEEL REFRIGERATORS.
customer_reviews.author: swheels

customer_reviews.title: Don't listen to the negative comments!! This product is GREAT.
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I did not trust the negative comments on this product. The size is perfect. It fits our toothbrushes and toothpaste and keeps them clean and covered. The bottom also serves as a great vent - I have had this product for almost a month and there is still no mold or mildew in the container. Other tooth brush holders would have to be cleaned and sanitized weekly, but this one simply requires a quick rinse and also a quick wipe down on the outside to remove any fingerprints (like most stainless products I own). All in all, if you are a neat freak like me - this product is ideal!
customer_reviews.author: JoRose

customer_reviews.title: Perfect option for hiding in plain sight!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic storage for our family of four. Allows our one full bath to appear organized, and also when guests are over our brushes can be covered up/hidden from view. No risk of getting splashed while someone washes their hands. Perfect for our bathroom which has no options for storing our brushes!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Looks sharp.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Stores both brushs and toothpaste. Its vented on the top to allow air to dry your brush. It keeps the new vanity looking nice and you still have ear of access to your toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the concept of this
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of this. It is actually my second toothbrush organizer (the first is a different brand and marketplace). I prefer this one simply because it seals shut, which is what I really want for my toothbrushes. But, darn it all. It smudges and gets finger prints all over it. If the prints would wipe away easily, I would give it 5 stars. Unfortunately, they are very hard to remove. I do love the drainage holes in the bottom so the water doesn't sit in there. Over all, I am super happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kay2TheEeeWhyEss

customer_reviews.title: Good Grips Stainless Steel Toothbrush Organizer
customer_reviews.text: The Good Grips Stainless Steel Toothbrush Organizer brought harmony back into our home. One of our cats decided to chew on our tooth brushes daily. This toothbrush organizer fit perfectly on our small sink, and also kept the cat away from our toothbrushes. Everyone was happy...except the cat. :)
customer_reviews.author: TEH

customer_reviews.title: Very nice toothbrush and toothpaste holder.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use in our camper. It is a nice size without taking up much space. It holds the toothpaste and toothbrushes well. Its really easy to take apart and clean. It also looks nice. I'm thinking of getting another one for our house.
customer_reviews.author: MaryM

customer_reviews.title: Must purchase for your toothbrushes!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this product...this one is to give as a gift for my mother in law. She saw mine and loved the sleek look of it. She was amazed how functional it was too!
customer_reviews.author: silvia

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Nice item. Sturdy, ventilated with air gaps in bottom, takes apart to ckean. I really like this item. Tooth paste to be fits perfectly and room for a number of tooth brushes.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ande

customer_reviews.title: I was sent a used unit
customer_reviews.text: I received today what looks like to be a used model. There's a try me lapel on the loose lid and fingerprints all over the body of the unit! I believe I was sent a used model!!
customer_reviews.author: SJC Beach Girl

customer_reviews.title: Disregard negative reviews,  it's STYLISH AND WELL MADE.
customer_reviews.text: Inspite of some of the reviews, I went ahead and ordered this cover toothbrush holder. DISREGARD THEM!.....It's stylish, well made and not huge, simply what the description describes as...about 9" tall. Clean, well made. If I was going to complain about anything, it should have a rubberized base to keep from slipping, but I don't see how the holder would move under any circurmstances. I was happy with it and it's work the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey LadyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not for electric toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to receiving this product but was disappointed when it arrived. The product itself was good. However, for my use it was not useful. It doesn't have a bottom, you can see your counter top when you remove the divider. I was hoping it would hold the toothpaste and 2 oral B electric toothbrushes. which it would when taking out the divider. I can buy a bristle cover and it would be the same effect. My journey continues for the one I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a much more decorative one that unfortunately is no longer available. Agree with other ratings it shows smears & spots from water etc. Cumbersome design. Will continue to shop for a replacement but will deal with this one in the meanwhile. Does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Romance reader

customer_reviews.title: Good toothbrush holder.
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this so far. I'd say it holds up to 4 toothbrushes. I like that it has vents. If there is anything to gripe about it's that it smudges up easily but that's not a big problem cause it just takes a second to wipe it down.
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye Guy

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: Rather large. Great idea. I bought it to hold an electric toothbrush from a kitten who likes to knock things off of everything. This hides the toothbrush well.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Sleek
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sleek design. The only issue that I experienced was that if you have a toothbrush that has a wide base it doesn’t fit in the compartment within the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Yaya Luvs U

customer_reviews.title: Returned!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this, hated it, returned it. It's too big, the top is floppy, and for some reason it has "try me" written on the lid. It's ridiculous, don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Empress

customer_reviews.title: Great product but watch out for fingerprints
customer_reviews.text: I like how it hides the brushes and paste for when visitors come over. It is just a fingerprint magnet. Since i need to handle it everytime we brush our teeth, I can't keep it clean. =(
customer_reviews.author: T&C

customer_reviews.title: My old toothbrush holder kept getting mold in it and was pretty nasty. This one has a nice look too
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. It has ventilation at the top and keeps moisture out. My old toothbrush holder kept getting mold in it and was pretty nasty. This one has a nice look too. The only downside is that it shows water splatter pretty easily, but I just spray the outside with some all-purpose cleaner and wipe it with a paper towel and it's good and shiny. It has plenty of room for toothbrushes and a tube of toothpaste. I think there are 4 slots in it, but you could probably fit more if you really wanted. I just have 2 in there and toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: nice holder
customer_reviews.text: The size of the holder is a little big, but it does hold 4 toothbrushes and a tube of toothpaste. I bought it so that I could just close the lid and keep my toothbrushes protected. It does that well. The only drawback for me is that I use toothpaste with a flip top (not a screw on top), and the top seems to get "caught" if I put it cap side down in the holder.
customer_reviews.author: Debster777

customer_reviews.title: works great but bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than I thought it would be but it works great. You could fit 4 toothbrushes in it plus tooth paste. I put two wine corks in the bottom because I use the shorter wider toothpaste container not the regular tube. Fits perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Style and best coverup!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you like to keep things organized and clean in bathroom, this one is good addition. Enough space and clean lid!!! Above all steel effect gives a classy touch!!
customer_reviews.author: Lakshmy Moorthy

customer_reviews.title: Hygienic
customer_reviews.text: We needed a toothbrush holder that our cat couldn't destroy. This is very stylish and sturdy and our cat is not interested in playing with it. Cleans easily and has room for motorized toothbrushes and toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly K. Ball

customer_reviews.title: Solved my toothbrush storage problem
customer_reviews.text: I love this holder. It allows airflow so the tooth brushes dry but keeps everything protected. It takes up a small area of counterspace and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Baragona

customer_reviews.title: Great storage and sleek
customer_reviews.text: Love that it’s easy to clean. The lid has a little handle. My husband likes that it’s sleek and hygienic. Much better than having our toothbrush out in the open.
customer_reviews.author: Holly D.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great toothbrush holder
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toothbrush holder.The lid opens and closes smoothly. The inside divider comes out for easy cleaning. There is a vent at the bottom to keep things from growing in the bottom. My toothbrushes are safe from flying debris in the bathroom. My only complaint is that, like with all stainless products, you will notice fingerprints. But I knew that would happen when I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Mae

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: We love this toothbrush organizer. There's a space for toothpaste and several toothbrushes. I also like the fact that there's several holes for the brushes to "breath." I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Just OKAY
customer_reviews.text: Item is much larger than I imagined. That is probably my fault for not researching the measurements. Definitely too big for traveling. I also do not like that the lid does not clamp shut.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlynn Walker

customer_reviews.title: Good but needs to be clean all the time
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stuff and I really like it But keep in mind you will have to clean it all the time cuz of all drops of water will stay on it
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend buying it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is very sleek and clean. I bought the silver one and it looks great. Fits the four toothbrushes and 1 toothpaste, comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Kaveeta Sasha Narinesingh

customer_reviews.title: Super Bathroom Buy
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I have bought for the bathroom. My toothpaste and brush worries as they sit on the sink counter are over. These item protects/shields from any hand washing, spitting in the sink area and rinsing whatever. I just love it. You can see on the case all what it shields your brush from. I wipe it down after every hand drying it keep it shinny.
customer_reviews.author: The Brute

customer_reviews.title: Toothbrush Protection
customer_reviews.text: It keeps manual toothbrushes and powered toothbrush heads covered so they're not exposed to bacteria, germs, and chemicals used in the bathroom. It accommodates a large tube of toothpaste. The interior holder removes easily for cleaning. There is room for drainage from wet toothbrushes and heads, but I have had to do very little cleaning of the sink from drainage. I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda C

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'd return it if I could. It's bulky/clunky. Only holds one thing of toothpaste and constantly shows fingerprints/watermarks.
customer_reviews.author: SchwaW

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: It’s just what we needed actually. We have some cats jumping on the counters. We don’t want them getting funny with our exposed toothbrushes. Fits our odd shaped toothbrushes too.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Streamlined
customer_reviews.text: Nice streamlined look but leaves water stains and fingerprints very easily. Love the air vents o top for ventilation!
customer_reviews.author: Moregain

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Design
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept and the design Inside piece removes easy for cleaning. My only disappointment was the top lid seems to fall off sometimes when it’s fully open. I reached out to the seller it was replaced & it actually came with a different top. Very happy great customer service Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Denise Marsh

customer_reviews.title: I do not like how the toothbrushes touch one another if you have ...
customer_reviews.text: Does keep the tooth brushes a little more sanitary. However, I do not like how the toothbrushes touch one another if you have 4 in them. Also, the stainless steel outside shows every water mark and you cant help some water getting on.
customer_reviews.author: collegekidmom

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product, however, it turned out to be too big for my counter-top. It's a very bulky item in general.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inspect your purchase thoroughly and if not satisfied send it BACK!
customer_reviews.text: I love this toothbrush holder, but the product was a floor model not only did it have a sticker saying so but it had quite a bit of scratches on it. And the box was in terrible shape with tape holding it together. Thankfully it wasn’t a gift. After I thought about it I really should have returned it. This should have been a clearanced out item with the shape it was in.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Stempinski

customer_reviews.title: Sanitary storage
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful in the bathroom . They hide away your toothbrush and toothpaste . They keep germs off your brush .
customer_reviews.author: Retha Heavener

customer_reviews.title: Great hiding place for toothbrushes.
customer_reviews.text: It is not small. It would be nice if there was a smaller unit that held two toothbrushes instead of four. Nevertheless, I like it and it works well!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Great Classic bathroom piece
customer_reviews.text: I love it, easy to clean, very organized, nice rubber guides for easy in/out brushes, very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: DJPORTS

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Your Dental Care Clean and Your Bathroom Organized
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a temporary fix when I began to co-habit with my other half in a temporary living space where space was at a premium. It neatly protected our toothbrushes from dust particles and whatever else flies through the air in a bathroom. It works so well that even after moving into our new, larger, and permanent space, I kept this item and still like it for the original reasons I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Rosenfeld

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This keeps my toothbrush, toothpaste and floss brush all in one spot. I feel better knowing all are enclosed for cleanliness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: N/A
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality product. Not for travel, item is very large. This item is for countertop use only.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra McLain

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my toothbrushes out of sight and out of whatever germs might be floating in the bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Pat A.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my toothbrush and paste organized
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was a closed container for my toothbrush and toothpaste. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Grider

customer_reviews.title: Sanitary way to protect your toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: Small enough not to take up a lot of room on my vanity, easy to clean and protect my toothbrushes when not being used.
customer_reviews.author: cecerider

customer_reviews.title: Larger Than You Think
customer_reviews.text: I got this to hold my portable bidet. But when inner liner is removed there is no bottom. I'm looking for just the right size glass or disk and then it will be perfect for that use. It's way too big as a toothbrush holder unless you have lots of people using one bathroom. Better than having the toothbrushes out in the open, but I'd prefer a UV cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Blindmango

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great design. Only complaint is the outside is hard to keep clean - it always looks streaky.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great design!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on the counter and keeps toothbrushes sanitized in the bathroom. I would give it 5 stars if it was more fingerprint and smudge resistant, but it does what it's supposed to do. I also like the different compartments inside to keep the toothbrushes from touching each other. There's even room for the toothpaste tube. Great design!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie R

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and I keep on my bath room counter top. Easy to clean and useful. Happy.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent way to hold brushes and tooth paste. We have a unit in each of two bathrooms. Another member of our family saw it and bought one as a Christmas gift for someone. The unit is well constructed and easy to keep clean. A great gift for yourself or a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Dohboy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for downstairs powder room!
customer_reviews.text: Great for hiding toothbrushes! Now powder room doesn't look like garbage 😑. I hated husband's hygiene products on display 😤
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Brushed Stainless toothbrush and toothpaste storage
customer_reviews.text: Great easy to use storage for toothpaste, toothbrush, and other teeth accessories no need to leave toothbrush on the counter and in bathroom air brushed stainless
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Palumbo

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Looks good alongside the stainless accessories in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandma and she loves it. Just keep in mind it does have to be cleaned regularly because if water is trapped inside it can start to mold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit a battery operated toothbrush.
customer_reviews.text: We have battery-operated toothbrushes that are not that large. They do not fit. Since we bought one for each member, we are able to put the toothbrush where the paste would go and have the paste in the drawer. In the end, it does protect the brush from being out in the open, so that part is nice. Wish it was more clear about the size.
customer_reviews.author: DL F.

product_meta.title: OXO 1286600 Good Grips Stainless Steel Toothbrush Organizer
product_meta.description:
Item Package Quantity:1| Size:AOXO Good Grips Stainless Steel Toothbrush OrganizerThe OXO Good Grips Stainless Steel Toothbrush Organizer is an elegant solution for storing and protecting up to four toothbrushes and a full tube of toothpaste. The wide-angled opening makes it easy to access contents inside, while rings inside the Organizer keep toothbrushes steady and upright. The internal divider accommodates toothbrushes with large ergonomic handles and can easily be removed for cleaning. Air vents on the top and bottom help toothbrushes dry after use. Product Measures: 9. 5 IN x 3. 75 IN x 4. 125 IN

BRAND STORY
By
feature_bullets: Angled opening makes it easy to access toothbrushes
Top and bottom slots allow for additional ventilation
Fits up to 4 toothbrushes and a full tube of toothpaste
Durable ABS and stainless steel. Measures 4.5" L x 4" W x 9.75" H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,191 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
